statement.name: GetContractsByVendors
statement.sql: select fiscal_year, vendor_name, purchase_order_count, spend_to_date from public.fy_vendor_summary_vw where fiscal_year = '2013' order by spend_to_date DESC

statement.name: GetCountContractsByVendors
statement.sql: select DISTINCT vendor_name from public.fy_vendor_summary_vw where fiscal_year = '2013'
